headline: Comcast’s 4.45% Yield Looks Tempting: Should You Take the Bait?
summary: Comcast recently sent $0.33 per share to investors in January 2026, marking the company’s eighteenth consecutive year of dividend growth. The cable and media giant’s dividend program stands out in a sector where many competitors have slashed or eliminated payouts entirely. With a current yield of 4.09% and a remarkably conservative payout ratio of just ... Comcast’s 4.45% Yield Looks Tempting: Should You Take the Bait?
